titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Lieutenant General of Ireland, for setling the Protestant religion, maintaining his Majesties just rights, and the priviledges of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Cork, and re-printed at London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
